replies.body: I've had that a couple of times...

Riot: "We designed runeglaive to make jungling easier for AP mains"
Players: "You mean Fiddles?"
Riot: "You're right, we should add some consistency to that claim."
_Patch 5.23: ~~Fiddles is an ap main.~~ I'm sorry, who?_
Players: " >:( "

Reminds me of the "tag-team" retitle. Riot has found out how to make patch-fixes SO MUCH EASIER.

Cue Formula 51 quote:
"I told you to take care of him, not... \*\*\*\*in' TAKE CARE of him!!!"
I was more concerned about that fiddlesticks... Needed like a minute to realize that he actually might look like that from this angle.
